title: José dos Santos Lopes
text: José dos Santos Lopes (1 November 1910 or 25 February 1911 – 28 August 1996) was a Brazilian <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player. He played for <a href="Brazil%20national%20football%20team">Brazil national team</a> at the <a href="1938%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1938 FIFA World Cup</a> finals.
